@klump wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:4, topic:478343”][quote author=klump link=topic=596538.msg4200232#msg4200232 date=1358084042]
ty man bbut can u help me?
[/quote]

You would fetch it as you would Data from an Imported File, or edit the Command so that the String is Variable.

EDIT: This was probably set to 5,000 as a Default value with the specific purpose of testing in mind.[/quote]

i dont know what that means? tell me that again in english ? lol and i put the 50000 myself … it was 120 before … so every npc i spawn, even a man have 50000 hp

item.title: Project 06 "npc" command
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

klump:

ty man bbut can u help me?

You would fetch it as you would Data from an Imported File, or edit the Command so that the String is Variable.

EDIT: This was probably set to 5,000 as a Default value with the specific purpose of testing in mind.

item.title: Project 06 "npc" command
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You didn’t post the Code with any type of Conventions or a Tag. Here’s the same Code you posted with Conventions and the proper Tag. In the future, please do this, as It’s easier on the eyes.

     
     if (playerCommand.startsWith("npc")) {
          try {
               int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
     if (newNPC > 0) {
          Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 50000, 0, 70, 70, false, false);
     } else {
          c.sendMessage("Requested NPC does not exist.");
                    }
               } catch (Exception e) {
          }
     }

Read full topic

item.title: Project 06 "npc" command
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

hi guys i got this source called “project 06” and here is the “npc” command

        if (playerCommand.startsWith("npc")) {
            try {
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
                if (newNPC > 0) {
                    Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 50000, 0, 70, 70, false, false);
                } else {
                    c.sendMessage("Requested NPC does not exist.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
            }
        }

how do i do so it takes the hp from the npc file instead of 50000 witch it is in this case? …
anybody would could see that this command is creating any npc with 50000 hp … so how would i make it take the hp from the npc file… ?
sorry for repeating myself

Read full topic
